timeline.bodyText: This is a breaking change, I think we need to guarantee the backwards compatibility.
timeline.author: conker84
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -79,15 +79,15 @@ image::play-movies.png[title="Movies Graph Visualization"]
 [[ttl-expireAt]]
 === Expire node(s) at specified time
 
-The `apoc.ttl.expireAtInstant` procedure deletes a node or group of nodes after the datetime specified.
+The `apoc.ttl.expire` procedure deletes a node or group of nodes after the datetime specified.

replies.bodyText: I am not sure I get it, there is no procedure expireAtInstant. I thought I was correcting an inconsistency in the docs (see screenshot).
replies.author: lqst

replies.bodyText: Oh sorry I missed that, thank you!
replies.author: conker84

replies.bodyText: This has been fixed already in 4.1. Removing from this pr.
replies.author: lqst
